thread.title: Sonam Kapoor: It was intimidating to be on sets with Salman Khan
thread.title_full: Sonam Kapoor: It was intimidating to be on sets with Salman Khan - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sonam Kapoor: It was intimidating to be on sets with Salman Khan
text:
Sonam Kapoor has shared screen space with Salman Khan in her debut film "Saawariya", but the actress says she was intimidated to romance the superstar in Sooraj Barjatya's "Prem Ratan Dhan Payo".*Sonam Kapoor. Pic/ Santa Banta*
"I feel privileged to be a part of the film. I have been a huge fan of Salman Khan for a long time. ... Â»
